description: Ask your partner what you find so attractive about him/her.
Make a heart out of tea lights and place a loving message for your partner in the middle.
Add up how many years, months and days your relationship has lasted and drink to that.
Caress your partner tenderly with your hands.
Ask your partner to guess which flowers you find romantic. If he/she guesses wrong, he/she should give you a beautiful bouquet of the (correct) flowers to make up for it.
Search the internet to find out which (romantic) characteristics belong to your partner's star sign. Tell him/her about it.
Gently massage your partner's feet with oil by candlelight.
Massage your partner's neck and shoulders sensitively by candlelight.
Ask your partner to tell you in detail what your life will be like in 10 years' time.
Have a nice photo taken of yourself and give it to your partner as a gift.
Ask your partner what their biggest dream for the future is.
Tell your partner what the best present you have ever received from him/her was.
Think of a good task for your partner. She/he can do it herself/himself.
Wear clothes that you know your partner will find attractive. Ask him/her to dance to a swinging song.
Ask your partner what made her/him laugh horribly last time and then tell her/him what made you laugh horribly.
Send your partner an 'arousing' text message shortly, in which you tell him/her in no uncertain terms that you desire him/her.
Turn on your partner's favorite CD and dance with him/her.
Prepare a picnic with things your partner particularly likes. Take her/him to a romantic place.
Put a little of your partner's favorite drink in your mouth and give it to him/her by kissing him/her romantically.
Leave a trail of hearts, rose petals or tea lights that lead to a surprise for your partner.
Get your partner's favorite sweets and give them to him/her.
Watch the starry sky together by candlelight with a good glass of wine.
Stand behind your partner in front of the mirror and tell her/him why you like something about her/his body.
Prepare something delicious for your partner and serve it in the shape of a heart.  Make a little party out of it!
Tell your partner when and why you last missed him/her terribly.
Think of a small gift for your partner so that they can see that you were thinking of them today.
Prepare a wonderful bath or footbath for your partner. Put tea lights in the bath beforehand and switch off the light. Call him/her and help him/her into the bath in a romantic way.
Take your partner on a little romantic trip, either on foot or by car, it should be a surprise, so don't reveal anything beforehand.

Tell your partner what your most beautiful  
 the most beautiful love story you have seen or read. What was so beautiful about it for you?
Rent a romantic movie and invite your partner over for a cosy evening in front of the TV!
 
Go to your favorite pub just around the corner and have a good drink together to celebrate your love life!
Do a love test together on the internet.
Ask your partner to tell you when you looked the most attractive.
Today, take over a household task from your partner that they normally do.
Get into the shower together and soap each other up. Rinse off romantically.
Put a romantic note in your partner's wallet.
Send your partner a loving message by post.
Ask your partner to tell you when you looked the most attractive.
Take a piece of fruit that your partner particularly likes. Prepare it and feed it to him/her lovingly.
Prepare breakfast in bed for your partner once in the following days. Tell him/her when, because he/she should be able to look forward to it.
Make yourselves comfortable at home and play a board game. Whoever wins gets to make her/his romantic wish come true.
Give your partner lots of compliments the next time you meet up with good friends.
Sleep in together tomorrow or at the weekend!
Call your partner today and tell him/her that you love him/her.
Just write to him/her once: “I love you”.
Gently lick your partner's earlobe and whisper sweet words in his/her ear.
Ask your partner in detail how their day was.
Send or bring your partner a beautiful bouquet of flowers with a love letter today.
Your partner should show you and demonstrate how you behave when you are completely happy and content.
Surprise your partner with a self-written love recipe.
Put a loving note on your partner's pillow before going to bed.
Take off an item of clothing that you know your partner likes and finds exciting.
Name three good or pleasant characteristics of your partner.

Close your eyes and describe in detail some parts of your partner's body where you would recognize him/her at any time. Can you recognize him/her among thousands?
 
Blindfold your partner and gently kiss and caress him/her.
Write your partner a beautiful poem.
Write a loving text or poem for your partner on the back of a photo of yourself. Give it to her/him today!
Plan a date for a romantic getaway with your partner. Make the day highly romantic and turn it into an unforgettable experience.

Place lighted tea lights in the bath or shower and invite your partner to a joint washing ceremony. Lights out!
Prepare a romantic meal. But only wear an apron.
Hide a (homemade) voucher for a cuddle, a meal for two or a trip at the weekend.
Read your favorite passage from one of your favorite books to your partner.
Ask your partner which character traits you find pleasant in him/her.
Flirt with your partner tonight.
Undress your partner when you go to bed. She/he doesn't need to do anything for once.

Write several notes with lovely texts for your partner and also write down the date. 
 Hide the notes in unexpected places.
Ask your partner where they would most like to be massaged. Now massage him/her there.
Take a bath or shower together.  Dry each other off and rub each other with body lotion.
Put a sweet in your mouth and pass it to your partner. Keep alternating and suck the sweet together in this way.
Can you remember a quote or statement that applies to your relationship? Discuss this with your partner.
Give your partner a lovely nickname that suits him/her well.  Be creative!
Slowly and seductively take off a piece of clothing that you know your partner likes and finds exciting.
Both write a wish list of three things you and your partner will do for each other in the coming week.
Tell your partner what love means to you.
Kiss your partner passionately.
Tell your partner what you found so attractive about him/her when you first met.
Let your partner guide you on a walk in the dark.
Surprise your partner; serve something that you think they might really like at that moment. Make the surprise festive.
Tell your partner about your most romantic experience together.

Tell your partner what music you find very romantic, describe what images this music evokes in you.
  
Write a short love letter or poem to your partner and give it to him/her,
Pamper each other in a pleasant way; only one candle should burn next to your bed.
Tell your partner what your zodiac sign is and what characteristics you have. Ask him/her for his/her opinion.

Use your tongue to write a word on your partner's back or stomach. He/she should guess what you have written.
 
Mix a cocktail with two straws and drink it together.
Ask your partner to turn on some very romantic music.
Cuddle with your partner, but without making love!
Tell your partner the last time you had to laugh horribly at him/her.

Make a romantic wish. Your partner will fulfill it! However, he/she should agree to it!
Give your partner a wonderful head massage.
Tell your partner why you think he/she loves you. And... Is it true?
Tell your partner what you have recently enjoyed about him/her.
Send your partner a romantic e-card.
Describe the most romantic place you've ever been and explain why it was so romantic for you.
Take your camera and take photos of each other. Take a series of romantic photos,

Tell your partner about your most intimate wish that concerns you both.
 
Tell your partner when you have ever been completely happy.
 
If your partner was born as an animal again, which animal would you wish for him/her?
Put your favorite perfume on a handkerchief and give it to your partner.
If you are home first, place lighted tea lights from the front door to the bedroom. Expect your partner in this romantic ambience.
Tell your partner when and why you can melt away for them.
Describe your most romantic dream.
Send your partner a message and invite him/her to dinner.
Look your partner kindly in the eye and name something you like about him/her.

Ask your partner to name a number under 50. Spread as many delicious kisses all over their body.
 
Can you guess what romantic wish your partner is currently harboring? Can you fulfill it?
 
Turn on some cuddly music that your partner also likes. Challenge him/her to a wonderful slow dance!
Burn a CD with your favorite music this week and give it to your partner.
Have your partner tell you what qualities you have that he/she doesn't at the moment. And vice versa?
Cook your partner an egg in the morning. Does he/she prefer hard or soft?
Ask your partner to guess where you have an erogenous zone.
Turn on music that you often listened to together at the beginning of your relationship.
Have a striptease competition. Play a parlor game that you both like and in which one of you wins quickly. Whoever loses takes off an item of clothing.
Tell your partner what struck you most when you saw each other for the first time.
Imagine that your partner wins 100,000 in the lottery tomorrow.  What will he/she do with the money? Is your answer correct?
Think of a romantic task for your partner!
Tell your partner your deepest wish.
Ask your partner to guess which event in your life has surprised you the most.
Ask your partner what you find so attractive about him/her.

Make a heart out of tea lights and place a loving message for your partner in the middle.
Search the internet to find out which (romantic) characteristics belong to your partner's star sign. Tell him/her about it.
Gently massage your partner's feet with oil by candlelight.
Massage your partner's neck and shoulders sensitively by candlelight.
Ask your partner to tell you in detail what your life will look like in 10 years' time.
Have a nice photo taken of yourself and give it to your partner as a gift.
Ask your partner what their biggest dream for the future is.
Tell your partner what the best present you have ever received from him/her was.
